About

Hi, I’m Kevin from Pennington, NJ.
I’m a high school junior passionate about machine learning, data science, statistics, and building AI that solves real problems.

Current Focus

  • Deepening time series forecasting & NLP
  • Mastering model interpretability & deployment

Toolkit

  • Languages: Python (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn), SQL basics
  • ML/DL: TensorFlow, PyTorch (early stage)
  • Visualization: Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly
  • Deployment: Streamlit

Philosophy

I learn best by building experiments. Each run — success or spectacular failure — teaches something valuable about how data tells stories.
